text: Moshi madjika ka ni ritoku ga ari, mata seito mo mijikainaraba, kare-ra wa kanarazu anata ni shitagattadearou. Daga kare-ra ni wa, michinori ga (amarini) toi to omowa reta. Mamonaku, kare-ra wa, arra ni kakete chikau. `Dekirukotonara, anata gata to issho ni shussei shita nodaga.' Kare-ra wa jibun no tamashi o horobosu monodearu. Arra wa kare-ra ga, itsuwatte iru koto o shitte ora reru
